[00:00.00]Intro - J. Cole
[00:10.55]Will someone please turn off my mind
[00:15.20]My thoughts are racing all the time
[00:19.07]
[00:19.73]There is no reason or no rhyme
[00:23.60]
[00:24.11]I'm trapped inside myself
[00:27.05]
[00:29.29]A newborn baby has two primary forms of communication
[00:32.82]
[00:34.08]Laughter which says I love this
[00:37.76]
[00:38.91]Or crying which says this frightens me I'm in pain
[00:44.59]
[00:46.70]Life can bring much pain
[00:48.27]
[00:49.78]There are many ways to deal with this pain
[00:52.09]
[00:55.44]Choose wisely
[00:56.50]
[01:13.19]There are many ways to deal with this pain
[01:15.41]
